title: Awkward, Single & Ready to Mingle with Fred Stoller
itunes:title: Awkward, Single & Ready to Mingle with Fred Stoller
itunes:subtitle: Awkward, Single and Ready to Mingle with Fred Stoller
description:
On today’s show, Emily welcomes comedian, actor and author of “Maybe We’ll Have You Back: The Life of a Perennial T.V. Guest Star,” Fred Stoller, to the studio. He, Emily and Menace talk about sex, dating and the funnier things in life, and discuss what it’s really like to be always the bridesmaid, never the bride.

In between jokes and hilarious anecdotes, Fred shares some of his dating anxieties, makes sexual confessions and teaches us what he’s learned about cultivating your self-confidence with the opposite sex. He also assists Emily in answering some of your emails on threesomes, office flirtations and getting rid of your “V card” for good.

If you’ve ever felt too awkward to date, or insecure in the world of sex and relationships, this show is here to give you hope, or at least someone to laugh along with. Don’t miss it!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
